attributes.action: Deny permission to build a super mosque on or near the Games site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is already a very large mosque near the Zoo.To build another in London is a deliberate affront to our Christian heritage,compounded by any funds from the public funds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
